problem:
Evaluate
\[\begin{vmatrix} 0 & b - a & c - a \\ a - b & 0 & c - b \\ a - c & b - c & 0 \end{vmatrix}.\]
gptanswer: The first matrix is just a zero matrix, so the second matrix is also a zero matrix. The third matrix is the first matrix times the second matrix, so it is also a zero matrix. The final matrix is the product of the first two matrices, so it is also a zero matrix. Thus, the final answer is $\boxed{0}$.
